line.originaltext: 2 tablespoons olive oil, divided
2 (6 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
1 1/2 tablespoons Cajun seasoning
2 cloves garlic, crushed
1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar
1 teaspoon Dijon mustard
salt and black pepper to taste
2 cups mixed salad greens
1 cup arugula
1 avocado - peeled, pitted, and diced
12 oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, drained and sliced
1/2 cup sliced black olives
Warm 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Warm 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
line.annotation: separate(ing0, ing12, "1 tablespoon oil", ing13, "1 tablespoon oil", "")

line.originaltext: Warm 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
line.annotation: cook(ing12, t0, ing14, "warmed oil", "warm over medium heat")

line.originaltext: Season both sides of chicken with Cajun seasoning, and place in hot oil.
line.annotation: combine({ing1, ing2}, ing15, "seasoned chicken", "season both sides of chicken")

line.originaltext: Season both sides of chicken with Cajun seasoning, and place in hot oil.
Stir in crushed garlic.
Stir in crushed garlic.
Cook chicken 5 minutes on each side, or until juices run clear.
Cook chicken 5 minutes on each side, or until juices run clear.
Remove chicken from skillet, drain on paper towels, cool slightly, and dice; discard oil and garlic.
Remove chicken from skillet, drain on paper towels, cool slightly, and dice; discard oil and garlic.
Remove chicken from skillet, drain on paper towels, cool slightly, and dice; discard oil and garlic.
Remove chicken from skillet, drain on paper towels, cool slightly, and dice; discard oil and garlic.
Remove chicken from skillet, drain on paper towels, cool slightly, and dice; discard oil and garlic.
Remove chicken from skillet, drain on paper towels, cool slightly, and dice; discard oil and garlic.
In a small bowl, mix remaining olive oil, balsamic vinegar, mustard, salt, and pepper.
In a small bowl, mix remaining olive oil, balsamic vinegar, mustard, salt, and pepper.
In a small bowl, mix remaining olive oil, balsamic vinegar, mustard, salt, and pepper.
In a large bowl, gently toss the dressing with the mixed salad greens, arugula, avocado, sun-dried tomatoes, and olives.
In a large bowl, gently toss the dressing with the mixed salad greens, arugula, avocado, sun-dried tomatoes, and olives.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing11, ing22, ing7, ing8, ing9}, ing23, "salad with dressing", "")

line.originaltext: In a large bowl, gently toss the dressing with the mixed salad greens, arugula, avocado, sun-dried tomatoes, and olives.
Top with diced chicken to serve.
line.annotation: combine({ing20, ing24}, ing25, "salad with chicken", "top with chicken")

line.originaltext: Top with diced chicken to serve.
